body_html:
I just tried it, I don't see that error then, but get OutOfMemory errors instead (it looks like they happen at a later point, but I can't say that for sure).

2017-08-14 23:00:34.852292: W C:\tf\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\framework\op_kernel.cc:1192] Resource exhausted: OOM when allocating tensor with shape[189918321] (occurs many times)

body:
I just tried it, I don't see that error then, but get OutOfMemory errors instead (it looks like they happen at a later point, but I can't say that for sure).

`2017-08-14 23:00:34.852292: W C:\tf\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\framework\op_kernel.cc:1192] Resource exhausted: OOM when allocating tensor with shape[189918321]` (occurs many times)
